thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 18 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ABM Industries Says Tax Reform to Potentially Impact FY 2018 Shr From Cont Ops Forecast

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ABM Industries Says Tax Reform to Potentially Impact FY 2018 Shr From Cont Ops Forecast
text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - ABM Industries Inc:
* ABM INDUSTRIES SEES POTENTIAL IMPACT OF $0.40 TO $0.50 FROM TAX REFORM TO CURRENT FY 2018 OUTLOOK FOR EARNINGS PER SHARE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS - SEC FILING
* ABM INDUSTRIES SEES POTENTIAL IMPACT OF $0.28 FROM TAX REFORM TO CURRENT FY 2018 OUTLOOK FOR ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* ABM INDUSTRIES SEES MID-TEENS GROWTH IN ADJUSTED EPS‍​ OVER FY19 - FY20 Source text: ( bit.ly/2FRzCCA ) Further company coverage:
